GV05brupsb1u:2857: agnau brāhmaṇa e cāvikṛtaṃ sraṣṭṛ brahma,

GV05brupsb1u:2861: tasmāt tasminnagnau karma kṛtvā tatphalaṃ prārthayanta ityetadupapannam /
GV05brupsb1u:2862: brahmaṇe manuṣyeṣu - manuṣyāṇāṃ punarmadhye karmaphalecchāyāṃ nāgnyādinimittakriyāpekṣā, kiṃ tarhi?
GV05brupsb1u:2871: yasmādetābhyāṃ hi brāhmaṇāgnirūpābhyāṃ karmakartradhikaraṇarūpābhyāṃ yatsraṣṭṛ brahma sākṣādabhavat /
GV05brupsb1u:2872: atra tu paramātmalokamagnau brāhmaṇe cecchantīti kecit /
GV05brupsb1u:2885: tacca karma dharmākhyaṃ sarvāneva kartavyatayā niyantṛ puruṣārthasādhanaṃ va /
GV05brupsb1u:2886: tasmāttenaiva cetkarmaṇā svo lokaḥ paramātmākhyo 'vidito 'pi prāpyate,
GV05brupsb1u:2887: kiṃ tasyaiva padanīyatvena kriyata ityata āha-atheti pūrvapakṣavinivṛttyarthaḥ;yaḥ kaścit,
GV05brupsb1u:2888: ha vai asmātsaṃsārikāmakarmahetukādagnyadhīnakarmābhimānatayā vā brāhmaṇajātimātrakarmābhimānatayā vā āgantukādasvabhūtāllokāt,
GV05brupsb1u:2893: avidito 'vidyayā vyavahito 'sva ivājñātaḥ enam - saṅkhyāpūraṇa iva laukika ātmānam na bhunakti na pālayati śokamohabhayādidoṣāpanayena /
GV05brupsb1u:2894: yathā ca loke vedo 'nanukto 'nadhītaḥ karmādyavabodhakatvena na bhunakti,
GV05brupsb1u:2895: anyadvā laukikaṃ kṛṣyādi karmākṛtaṃ svātmanānabhivyañjitam ātmīyaphalapradānena na bhunakti,
GV05brupsb1u:2896: evamātmā svo lokaḥ svenaiva nityātmasvarūpeṇānabhivyañjito 'vidyādi prahāṇena na bhunaktyeva /
GV05brupsb1u:2904: mahadbahu aśvamedhādi puṇyaṃ karma iṣṭaphalameva nairantaryeṇa karoti,
GV05brupsb1u:2913: sa ya ātmānameva lokamupāste, tasya kim?
GV05brupsb1u:2919: “mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiñcana“iti yadvat /
GV05brupsb1u:2920: svātmalokopāsakasya viduṣo vidyāsaṃyogātkarmaiva na kṣīyata ityapare varṣayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:2921: lokaśabdārthaṃ ca karmasamavāyinaṃ dvidhā parikalpayanti kila eko vyākṛtāvasthā karmāśrayo loko hairaṇyagarbhākhyaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2922: taṃ karmasamavāyinaṃ lokaṃ vyākṛtaṃ paricchinnaṃ ya upāste,
GV05brupsb1u:2928: bhavatīyaṃ śobhanā kalpanā na tu śrautī /
GV05brupsb1u:2930: svaṃ lokamiti prastutya svaśabdaṃ vihāyātmaśabdaprakṣepeṇa punastasyaiva pratinirdeśādātmānameva lokamupāsīteti /
GV05brupsb1u:2932: pareṇa ca kevalavidyāviṣayeṇa viśeṣaṇāt -“kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ“(bṛ.u.4 / 4 / 22) ithi /
GV05brupsb1u:2933: putrakarmāparavidyākṛtebhyo hi lokebhyo viśinaṣṭi'ayamātmā no lokaḥ'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2934: “na hāsya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyata eṣo 'sya paramo lokaḥ“iti ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2937: asmātkāmayata ityayuktamiti cet - iha svo lokaḥ paramātmā,
GV05brupsb1u:2939: yadyatkāmayate tattadasmādātmanaḥ sṛjata ithi tadātmaprāptivyatirekeṇa phalavacanamayuktamiti cet,
GV05brupsb1u:2945: yadi hi para evātmā sampadyate tadā yuktaḥ asmāddhyevātmanaḥ ityātmaśabdaprayogaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2947: anyathā'avyākṛtāvasthātkarmaṇo lokāt'iti saviśeṣaṇamavakṣyāt prakṛtaparamātmalokavyāvṛttaye vyākṛtāvasthāvyāvṛttaye ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2950: atrāvidvān varṇāśramādyabhimāno dharmeṇa niyamyamāno devādikarmakartavyatayā paśuvatparatantra ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2951: kāni punastāni karmāṇi yatkartavyatayā paśuvatparatantro bhavati?
GV05brupsb1u:2952: ke vā te devādayo yeṣāṃ karmabhiḥ paśuvadupakaroti?
GV05brupsb1u:2955: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2956: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2958: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām /
GV05brupsb1u:2959: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām /
GV05brupsb1u:2960: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām /
GV05brupsb1u:2961: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2962: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet /
GV05brupsb1u:2963: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti /
GV05brupsb1u:2964: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam // BrhUp_1,4.16 //
GV05brupsb1u:2966: ayaṃ yaḥ prakṛto gṛhī karmādhikṛto 'vidvāñcharīrendriyasaṅghātādiviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍa ātmetyucyate;
GV05brupsb1u:2968: kaiḥ punaḥ karmaviśeṣairupakurvan keṣāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāṃ lokaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:2972: sa eva āsecanādhiko homaḥ tena homayāgalakṣaṇena karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena devānāṃ paśuvatparatantratvena pratibaddha iti lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2975: yacca prajāmicchati prajārthamudyamaṃ karoti - icchā cotpattyupalakṣaṇārthā - prajāṃ cotpādayatītyarthaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2976: tena karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena pitṛṇāṃ bhogyatvena paratantro lokaḥ /

GV05brupsb1u:2982: yadasya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsi ca pipīlikābhiḥ saha kaṇabalibhāṇḍakṣālanādyupajīvanti,
GV05brupsb1u:2985: tasmādyathā ha vai loke svāpya lokāya svasmai dehāyāriṣṭamavināśaṃ svatvabhāvāpracyutimicchet svatvabhāvapracyutibhayātpoṣaṇarakṣaṇādibhiḥ sarvataḥ

GV05brupsb1u:2992: na punastadvimokṣṇopāye vidyādhikāra iti nanūktaṃ devā rakṣantīti /
GV05brupsb1u:2997: yena prerito 'vaśa eva bahirmukho bhavati svasmāllokāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3007: 37) ityādi, mānave ca sarvā pravṛttiḥ kāmahetukyeveti /
GV05brupsb1u:3008: sa eṣor'thaḥ savistaraḥ pradarśyata iha ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ -
GV05brupsb1u:3011: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya /
GV05brupsb1u:3012: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brupsb1u:3015: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brupsb1u:3016: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3030: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca /
GV05brupsb1u:3031: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.17 //
GV05brupsb1u:3037: sa evaika āsīt - jāyādyeṣaṇābījabhūtā vidyāvāneka evāsīt /
GV05brupsb1u:3038: svābhāvikyā svātmani kartrādikārakakriyāphalātmakatādhyāropalakṣaṇayā avidyāvāsanayā vāsitaḥ so 'kāmayata kāmitavān /
GV05brupsb1u:3039: katham? jāyā karmādhikārahetubhūtā me mama kartuḥ syāt;
GV05brupsb1u:3043: atha vittaṃ me syātkarmasādhanaṃ gavādilakṣaṇam athāhamabhyudayaniḥśreyasasādhanaṃ karma kurvīya;
GV05brupsb1u:3048: etāvāneva hi kāmayitavyo viṣayo yaduta jāyāputravittakarmāṇi sādhanalakṣaṇaiṣaṇā;
GV05brupsb1u:3049: lokāśca trayo manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti phalabhūtāḥ sādhanaiṣaṇā,
GV05brupsb1u:3058: yena prayukto 'vidvānavaśa eva kośakāravadātmānaṃ veṣṭayati - karmamārga evātmānaṃ praṇidadhadbahirmukhībhūto na svaṃ lokaṃ pratijānāti /
GV05brupsb1u:3059: tathā ca taittirīyake -“agnimugdho haiva dhūmatāntaḥ svaṃ lokaṃ na pratijānāti“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3063: ityetadāśaṅkya hetumāha - yasmād na icchan ca na icchannapi,
GV05brupsb1u:3065: na hi loke phalasādhanavyatiriktaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā labdhavyamasti /
GV05brupsb1u:3068: etaduktaṃ bhavati - dṛṣṭārthamadṛṣṭārtha vā sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇam avidyāvatpuruṣādhikāraviṣayameṣaṇādvayaṃ kāmaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3076: tasmāttatsṛṣṭau etarhyetasminnapi kāla ekākī sanprāgdārakriyātaḥ kāmayate - jāyā me syāt,
GV05brupsb1u:3077: atha prajāyeya atha vittaṃ me syāt,
GV05brupsb1u:3079: sa evaṃ kāmayamānaḥ sampādayaṃśca jāyādīnyāvatsa eteṣāṃ yathoktānāṃ jāyādīnāmekaikamapi na prāpnoti,
GV05brupsb1u:3083: yadā tu na śaknoti kṛtsnatāṃ sampādayituṃ tadā asya kṛtsnatvasampādanāyāha - tasyo tasyākṛtsnatvabhimāninaḥ kṛtsnatā iyam evaṃ bhavati katham?
GV05brupsb1u:3085: tatra mano 'nuvṛtti hi itaratsarvaṃ kāryakaraṇajñātamiti manaḥ pradhānatvājātmevātmā /
GV05brupsb1u:3093: tābhyāṃ ca vāṅmanasābhyāṃ jāyāpatisthānīyābhyāṃ prasūyate prāṇaḥ karmārtham,
GV05brupsb1u:3098: gavādi hi manuṣyasambandhi vittaṃ cakṣurgrāhyaṃ karmasādhanam;
GV05brupsb1u:3101: cakṣuṣā hi yasmāttanmānuṣaṃ vittaṃ vindate gavādyupalabhata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3106: kasmāt? śrotreṇa hi yasmāttaddaivaṃ vittaṃ vijñānaṃ śṛṇoti;
GV05brupsb1u:3113: ātmanā hi śarīreṇa yataḥ karma karoti /
GV05brupsb1u:3114: tasyākṛtsnatvābhimānina evaṃ kṛtsnatā sampannā - yathā bāhyā jāyādilakṣaṇā evam /
GV05brupsb1u:3115: tasmātsa eṣa pāṅktaḥ pañcabhirnirvṛttaḥ pāṅkto yajño darśanamātranirvṛtto 'karmiṇo 'pi /
GV05brupsb1u:3118: sa ca paśuḥ puruṣaśca pāṅkta eva yathoktamanaādipañcatvayogāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3120: pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ paśutve 'pyadhikṛtatvenāsya viśeṣaḥ puruṣasyeti pṛthakpuruṣagrahaṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:3121: kiṃ bahunā? pāṅktamidaṃ sarvaṃ karmasādhanaṃ phalaṃ ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3123: evaṃ pāṅktaṃ yajñamātmānaṃ yaḥ sampādayat sa tadidaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmatvenāpnoti ya evaṃ veda //17//
GV05brupsb1u:3128: sa varṇāśramābhimānaḥ karmakartavyatayā niyato juhotyādikarmabhiḥ kāmaprayukto devādīnāmupakurvansarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ loka ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:3129: yathā ca svakarmabhirekaikena sarvairbhūtairasau loko bhojyatvena sṛṣṭaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3130: evamasāvapi juhotyādipāṅktakarmabhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvaṃ ca jagadātmabhojyatvenāsṛjat /
GV05brupsb1u:3131: evamekaikaḥ svakarmavidyānurūpyeṇa sarvasya jagato bhoktā bhojyaṃ ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3133: etadeva ca vidyāprakaraṇe madhuvidyāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ -'sarvaṃ sarvasya kāryaṃ madhu'ityātmaikatvavijñānārtham /
GV05brupsb1u:3134: yadasau juhotītyādinā pāṅktena kāmyena karmaṇā ātmabhojyatvena jagadasṛjata vijñānena ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3138: eteṣāmannānāṃ saviniyogānāṃ sūtrabhūtāḥ saṅkṣepataḥ prakāśakatvādime mantrāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3141: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat /
GV05brupsb1u:3143: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brupsb1u:3144: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā /
GV05brupsb1u:3145: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena /
GV05brupsb1u:3146: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati /
GV05brupsb1u:3150: medhayā prajñayā vijñānena tapasā ca karmaṇā;
GV05brupsb1u:3158: ato yāni saptānnāni jñānakarmabhyāṃ janitavānpitā tāni prakāśayiṣyāma iti vākyaśeṣaḥ //1//
GV05brupsb1u:3159: tatra mantrāṇāmarthastirohitatvāttprāyeṇa durvijñeyo bhavatīti tadarthavyākhyānāya brāhmaṇaṃ pravartate -
GV05brupsb1u:3162: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3163: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3164: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate /
GV05brupsb1u:3168: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati /
GV05brupsb1u:3173: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3174: tasmāt kumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanaṃ vānudhāpayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3175: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3176: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti /
GV05brupsb1u:3177: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brupsb1u:3178: tad yad idam āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvad apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3180: yad ahar eva juhoti tad ahaḥ punarmṛtyum apajayaty evaṃ vidvān /
GV05brupsb1u:3182: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadeti /
GV05brupsb1u:3184: sa hīdam annaṃ punaḥ punar janayate /
GV05brupsb1u:3187: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3188: yad dhaitan na kuryāt kṣīyeta ha /
GV05brupsb1u:3191: sa devān apigacchati sa ūrjam upajīvatīti praśaṃsā // BrhUp_1,5.2 //
GV05brupsb1u:3192: BrhUpBh_1,5.2 tatra'yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpitā'ityasya kor'tha ucyate?
GV05brupsb1u:3198: ityucyate - jāyādikarmāntānāṃ lokaphalasādhanānāṃ pitṛtvaṃ tāvat pratyakṣameva,
GV05brupsb1u:3200: tatra ca daivaṃ vittaṃ vidyā karma putraśca phalabhūtānāṃ lokānāṃ sādhanaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ pratītyabhihitam,
GV05brupsb1u:3203: eṣaṇā hi phalaviṣayā prasiddhaiva ca loke /
GV05brupsb1u:3208: vivakṣitastu śāstrīya eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo brahmavidyāvidhitsayā tadvairāgyasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3209: sarvo hyaṃ vyaktāvyaktalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro 'suddho 'nityaḥ sādhyasādhanarūpo duḥkho 'vidyāviṣaya ityetasmādviraktasya brahmavidyā ārabdhavyeti
GV05brupsb1u:3210: tatrānnānāṃ vibhāgena viniyoga ucyate-'ekamasya sādhāraṇma'iti mantrapadam,
GV05brupsb1u:3215: sa ya etatsādhāraṇaṃ sarvaprāṇabhṛtsthitikaraṃ bhujyamānamannamupāste tatparo bhavatītyarthaḥ--
GV05brupsb1u:3216: upāsanaṃ hi nāma tātparya dṛṣṭaṃ loke'gurumupāste' 'rājānamupāste'ityādau--tasmāccharīrasthityarthannopabhogapradhānonādṛṣṭārthakarmapradhāna
GV05brupsb1u:3217: sa evaṃ bhūto na pāpmano 'dharmadvayāvartate--na vimucyata ityetat /
GV05brupsb1u:3219: smṛtirapi-“nātmārtha pācayedannam” “apradāyaibhyo yo bhūṅkte stena eva saḥ” “annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi” ityādiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3221: miśraṃ hyetasmarseṣāṃ hi svaṃ tadapravibhaktaṃ yatprāṇibhirbhujyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3222: sarvabhojyatpādeva yo mukhe prakṣipyamāṇo 'pi grāsaḥ parasya pīḍākaro dṛśyate,
GV05brupsb1u:3226: gṛhiṇā vaiśvadevākhyamannaṃ yadahanyahani nirūpyata iti kecit,
GV05brupsb1u:3236: iṣyate hi tatsṛṣṭavaṃ tadviniyuttkatvaṃ ya sarvasyānnajātasya /
GV05brupsb1u:3237: na ca vaiśvadevākhyaṃ śāstroktaṃ karma kurvataḥ pāpmano 'vinivṛttiryuktā,
GV05brupsb1u:3246: ke te dve? ityucyate - hutaṃ ca prahutaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3249: yasmād dve ete anne hutaprahute devānabhājayatpitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3252: prajuhvati ca hutvā baliharaṇaṃ ca kurvata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3253: atho apyanya āhurdve anne pitrā devebhyaḥ pratte na hutaprahute, kiṃ tarhi?
GV05brupsb1u:3267: paśubhya ekaṃ prāyacchaditi - yatpaśubhya ekaṃ punastadannam? tatpayaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3269: ityata āha - payo hyagre prathamaṃ yasmānmanuṣyāśca paśavaśca payaḥ evopajīvantīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3270: ucitaṃ hi'tapo tadannam'anyathā kathaṃ tadevāgre niyamenopajīveyuḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:3274: tasmātkumāraṃ bālaṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā traivarṇikā jātakarmaṇi jātarūpasaṃyuktaṃ pratilehayanti paścāt pāyayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3284: ghṛtasyāpi payovikāratvātpayastvameva kasmātpunaḥ saptamaṃ satpaśvannaṃ caturthatvena vyākhyāyate?
GV05brupsb1u:3287: tacca karma sādhanaṃ vittasādhyaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyānnatrayasya sādhyasya,
GV05brupsb1u:3291: sukhaṃ hi nairantaryeṇa vyākhyātu śakyante 'nnāni vyākhyātāni ca sukhaṃ pratīyante /
GV05brupsb1u:3292: tasminsarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca netyasya kor'thaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:3293: ityucyate - tasminpaśvanne payasi sarvamadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagatpratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti prāṇaveṣṭāvadyacca na sthānaraṃ śailādi /
GV05brupsb1u:3297: agnihotrādyāhutivipariṇāmātmakaṃ ca jagatkṛtsnamiti śrutismṛtivādāḥ śataśo vyavasthitāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3299: yattadbrāhmaṇāntareṣvidamāhuḥ - saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvadapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti,
GV05brupsb1u:3300: saṃvatsareṇa kila trīṇi ṣaṣṭiśatānyāhutīnāṃ sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceti yājuṣmatīriṣṭakā abhisampadyamānāḥ saṃvatsarasya cāhorātrāṇi,
GV05brupsb1u:3302: evaṃ kṛtvā saṃvatsaraṃ juhvadapajayati punaḥ mṛtyum,
GV05brupsb1u:3303: itaḥ pretya deveṣu sambhūtaḥ punarna mriyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3309: yaduktam - payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ paya āhutivipariṇāmātmakatvātsarvasyeti,
GV05brupsb1u:3312: sakṛnmṛtvāviddhāñcharīreṇa viyujya sarvātmā bhavati na punarmaraṇāya paricchinnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3314: ityucyate - sarvaṃ samastaṃ hi yasmāddevebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'nnādyamannameva tadādyaṃ ca sāyaṃprātarāhutiprakṣepeṇa prayacchati /
GV05brupsb1u:3315: tadyuktaṃ sarvamāhutimayamātmānaṃ kṛtvā sarvadevānnarūpeṇa sarvairdevairekātmabhāvaṃ gatvā sarvadevamayo bhūtvā punarna mriyata iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3316: athaitadapyuktaṃ brāhmaṇena -“brahma vai svayambhū tapo 'tapyata tadaikṣata na vai tapasyānantyamasti,
GV05brupsb1u:3318: tatsarveṣu bhūteṣvātmānaṃ hutvā bhūtāni cātmani sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyagādhipatyaṃ paryet“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3320: yadā pitrā annāni sṛṣṭvā sapta pṛthakpṛthagbhoktṛbhiradyagānāni - tannimittatvātteṣāṃ sthiteḥ - sarvadā nairantaryeṇa;
GV05brupsb1u:3327: yathāsau pūrvamannānāṃ sraṣṭāsītpitā medhayā jāyādisambandhena ca pāṅktakarmaṇā bhoktā ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3328: tathā yebhyo dattānyannāni te 'pi teṣāmannānāṃ bhoktāro 'pi santaḥ pitara eva,
GV05brupsb1u:3329: medhayā tapasā ca yato janayanti tānyannāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3330: tadetadabhidhīyate puruṣo vai yo 'nnānāṃ bhoktā so 'kṣitirakṣayahetuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3332: ityucyate - sa hi yasmādidaṃ bhujyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāryakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ kriyāphalātmakaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3333: punaḥ punarbhūyo bhūyo janayata utpādayati dhiyā dhiyā tattatkālabhāvinyā tayā tayā prajñayā,
GV05brupsb1u:3334: karmabhiśca vāṅmanaḥkāyaveṣṭitaiḥ yadyadi ha yadyetatsaptavidhamannamuktaṃ kṣaṇamātramapi na kuryātprajñayā karmabhiśca,
GV05brupsb1u:3340: ataḥ prajñākriyālakṣaṇaprabandhārūḍhaḥ sarvo lokaḥ sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇaḥ kriyāphalātmakaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3344: tadetadvairāgyārthamucyate - dhiyā dhiyā janayate karmabhiryaddhaitanna kuryātkṣīyeta heti - viraktānāṃ hyasmādbrahmavidyā ārabdhavyā caturthapramukheṇeti
GV05brupsb1u:3346: vakṣyamāṇānyapi trīṇyannānyasminnavasare vyakhyātānyeveti kṛtvā teṣāṃ yāthātmyavijñānaphalamupasaṃhriyate - yo vā etām akṣitim akṣayahetuṃ yathoktaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3347: puruṣo vā akṣitiḥ sa hīdamannaṃ dhiyā dhiyā janayate karmabhiryaddhaitanna kuryātkṣīyate heti /
GV05brupsb1u:3348: so 'nnamatti pratīkenetyasyārtha ucyate - mukhaṃ mukhyatvaṃ prādhānyamityetat /
GV05brupsb1u:3349: prādhānyevānnānāṃ pituḥ puruṣasyākṣititvaṃ yo veda so 'nnamatti nānnaṃ prati guṇabhūtaḥ san /
GV05brupsb1u:3357: pāṅktasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhūtāni yāni trīṇyannāpyupakṣiptāni tāni kāryatvādvistīrṇaviṣayatvācca pūrvabhyo 'nnebhyaḥ pṛthagutkṛṣṭāni,
GV05brupsb1u:3358: teṣāṃ vyākhyānārtha uttaro grantha ā brāhmaṇaparisamāpteḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3362: anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nādarśam anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam iti manasā hy eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti /
GV05brupsb1u:3363: kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva /
GV05brupsb1u:3364: tasmād api pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti /
GV05brupsb1u:3365: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāg eva sā /
GV05brupsb1u:3366: eṣā hy antaṃ āyattaiṣā hi na /
GV05brupsb1u:3367: prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samāno 'na ity etat sarvaṃ prāṇa eva /
GV05brupsb1u:3370: BrhUpBh_1,5.3 trīṇyātmane 'kuruteti ko 'syārtha ityucyate - manovākprāṇā etāni trīṇyannāni,
GV05brupsb1u:3371: tāni mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ cātmane ātmārthamakuruta - kṛtavān sṛṣṭvā ādau pitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3372: teṣāṃ saṃśaya ityata āha - asti tāvanmanaḥ śrotrādibāhyakaraṇavyatiriktam,
GV05brupsb1u:3373: yata evaṃ prasiddham - bāhyakaraṇaviṣayātmasambandhe satyapyabhimukhībhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GV05brupsb1u:3375: ityukto vadati -'anyatra me gataṃ mana āsītso 'hamanyatramanā āsaṃ nādarśam' /
GV05brupsb1u:3376: tathā'idaṃ śrutavānasi madīyaṃ vacaḥ'ityuktaḥ'anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣaṃ na śrutavānasmi'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3377: tasmād yasyāsannidhau rūpādigrahaṇasamarthasyāpi sataścakṣurādeḥ svasvaviṣayasambandhe rūpāśabdādijñānaṃ na bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3380: tasmātsarvo hi lokāṃ manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti,
GV05brupsb1u:3395: yasmāccakṣuṣo hyagocare pṛṣṭhapto 'pyupaspṛṣṭhaḥ kenicid hastasyāyaṃ sparśo jānerayamiti vivekena pratipadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3396: yadi vivekakṛnmano nāma nāsti tarhi tvaṅmātreṇa kuto vivekapratipattiḥ syāt? tanmanaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3399: trīṇyannānīha phalabhūtāni karmaṇāṃ manovākprāṇākhyāni adhpātmamadhibhūtamadhidaivaṃ ca vyācikhyāsitāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3400: tatra ādhyātmikānāṃ vāṅmanaḥ prāṇānāṃ mano vyākhyātam /
GV05brupsb1u:3401: athedārnīvāgvattkavyetyāraṃmaḥ- yaḥ kaśca loke śabdo dhavanistālvādivyaṅgyaḥ prāṇibhirvarṇādilakṣaṇa itaro vā vāditramedhādinimittaḥ sarvo dhvanirvāgeva sā /
GV05brupsb1u:3404: eṣā punaḥ svayaṃ nābhidheyavatprakāśyā abhidheyaprakāśikaiv prakāśātmakatvāt pradīpādivat /
GV05brupsb1u:3406: tadvadvākprakāśikaiva svayaṃ na prakāśyetyanavasthāṃ śrutiḥ pariharati - eṣā hi na prakāśyā /
GV05brupsb1u:3408: atha prāṇa ucyate - prāṇo mukhanāsikāsañcāryā hṛdayavṛttiḥpraṇayanātprāṇaḥ apanayanānmūtrapurīṣāderapānano 'dhovṛttirānābhisthānaḥ;
GV05brupsb1u:3411: samānaḥ samaṃ nayanād bhuktasya pītasya ca koṣṭhasthāno 'nnapaktā,
GV05brupsb1u:3412: ana ityeṣāṃ vṛttiviśeṣāṇāṃ sāmānyabhūtā sāmānyadehaceṣṭābhisambandhinī vṛttiḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3418: ko 'sau? athaṃ kāryakaraṇasaṅghāta ātmā piṇḍa ātmasvarūpatvenābhimato 'vivekibhiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3419: aviśeṣeṇaitanmaya ityuktasya viśeṣeṇa vāṅmayo manomayaḥ prāṇamaya iti sphuṭīkaraṇam //3//
GV05brupsb1u:3423: vāg evāyaṃ loko mano 'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo 'sau lokaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.4 //
GV05brupsb1u:3424: BrhUpBh_1,5.4 traya lokā eta eva vāgevāyaṃ loko mano 'ntarikṣalokaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3429: vāg evargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.5 //
GV05brupsb1u:3434: mana eva pitā vāṅ mātā prāṇaḥ prajā // BrhUp_1,5.7 //
GV05brupsb1u:3435: BrhUpBh_1,5.5-7 trayo vedā ityādīni vākyāni ṛjvarthāni //5-7//
GV05brupsb1u:3438: yat kiñca vijñātaṃ vācas tad rūpam /
GV05brupsb1u:3442: tatra viśeṣaḥ - yatkiñca vijñātaṃ vispaṣṭaṃ jñātaṃ vācastadrūpam /
GV05brupsb1u:3443: tatra svayameva hetunāha - vāgdhi vijñātā prakāśātmakatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3444: kathamavijñātā bhaved yānyānapi vijñāpayadi“vācaiva samrāḍbandhuḥ prajñāyate“(4 / 1 /
GV05brupsb1u:3446: vāgviśeṣavida idaṃ phalamucyate - vāgevainaṃ yathoktavāgvibhūtividaṃ tadvijñātaṃ bhūtvā avati pālayati,
GV05brupsb1u:3450: yat kiñca vijijñāsyaṃ manasas tad rūpam /
GV05brupsb1u:3457: pūrvamanmanovibhūtividaḥ phalam - mana enaṃ tadvijijñāsyaṃ bhūtvā avati vijijñāsyasvarūpeṇaivānnatvamāpadyate //9//
GV05brupsb1u:3463: BrhUpBh_1,5.10 yatkiñcāvijñātaṃ vijñānāgocaraṃ na ca sandihyamānam,
GV05brupsb1u:3465: vijñātavijijñāsyāvijñātabhedena vāṅmanaḥprāṇavibhāge sthite trayo lokā ityādayo vācanikā eva /
GV05brupsb1u:3467: prāṇa enaṃ tadbhūtvā avati - avijñātarūpeṇaivāsya prāṇo 'nnaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3475: tad yāvaty eva vāk tāvatī pṛthivī tāvān ayam agniḥ // BrhUp_1,5.11 //
GV05brupsb1u:3476: BrhUpBh_1,5.11 tasyai tasyāḥ vācaḥ prajāpaterannatvena prastutāyāḥ pṛthivī śarīraṃ brahma ādhāraḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3479: tattatra yāvatyeva yāvatparimāṇaiva adhyātmādhibhūtabhedabhinnā satī vāgbhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3488: tad yāvad eva manas tāvatī dyaus tāvān asāv ādityaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3494: nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,5.12 //
GV05brupsb1u:3495: BrhUpBh_1,5.12 athaitasya prājāpatyānnoktasyaiva manaso dyaurdyulokaḥ śarīraṃ kāryamādhāraḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3497: tattatra yāvatparimāṇameva adhyātmamadhibhūtaṃ vā manastāvatī tāvadvistārā tāvatparimāṇā manaso jyotīrūpasya karaṇasya ādhāratvena vyavasthitā
GV05brupsb1u:3508: dvitīyo vai pratipakṣatvenopagataḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sapatna ityucyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3509: tena dvitīyatve 'pi sati vāṅmanase na sapatnatvaṃ bhajete,
GV05brupsb1u:3510: prāṇaṃ prati guṇabhāvopagate eva hi te adhyātmamiva /
GV05brupsb1u:3516: tad yāvān eva prāṇas tāvatya āpas tāvān asau candraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3517: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3518: sa yo haitān antavata upāste 'ntavantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati /
GV05brupsb1u:3519: atha yo haitān anantān upāste 'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.13 //
GV05brupsb1u:3527: tānyetāni pitrā pāṅktena karmaṇā sṛṣṭāni trīṇyannāni vāṅmanaḥprāṇākhyāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3531: ta ete vāṅmanaḥprāṇāḥ sarve eva samāstulyā vyāptimanto yāvatprāṇigocaraṃ sādhyātmādhibhūtaṃ vyāpya vyavasthitāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3535: sa yaḥ kaścid haitānprajāpaterātmabhūtānantavataḥparicchinnānadhyātmarūpeṇa vā adhibhūtarūpeṇa vā adhibhūtarūpeṇa vopāste,
GV05brupsb1u:3536: sa ca tadupāsanānurūpameva phalamantavantaṃ lokaṃ jayati,
GV05brupsb1u:3538: atha punaryo haitānanantānsarvātmakānsarvaprāṇyātmabhūtān aparicchinnānupāste so 'ntameva lokaṃ jayati //13//
GV05brupsb1u:3539: pitā pāṅktena karmaṇā saptānnāni sṛṣṭvā trīṇyannānyātmārthaṅkarodityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:3553: sa rātribhir evā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3554: so 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idaṃ prāṇabhṛd anupraviśya tataḥ prātar jāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3555: tasmād etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā apacityai // BrhUp_1,5.14 //
GV05brupsb1u:3556: BrhUpBh_1,5.14 'sa eṣaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ' -yo 'yaṃ tryannātmā prajāpatiḥ prakṛtaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3558: ṣoḍaśakalaḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā avayavā asya so 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarātmākālarūpaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3559: tasya ca kālātmanaḥ prajāpateḥ rātraya evāhorātrāṇi,
GV05brupsb1u:3562: dhruvaiva nityaiva vyavasthitā asya prajāpateḥ ṣoḍaśī ṣoḍaśānāṃ pūraṇī kalā /
GV05brupsb1u:3563: sa rātribhireva tithibhiḥ kaloktābhirāpūryate cāpakṣīyate ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3564: pratipadādyābhirhi candramāḥ prajāpatiḥ śuklapakṣa āpūryate kalābhirupacīyamānābhirvardhate yāvatsampūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ paurṇamāsyām /
GV05brupsb1u:3565: tābhirevāpacīyamānābhiḥ kalābhirapakṣīyate kṛṣṇapakṣe yāvad dhruvaikā kalā vyavasthitā amāvāsyām /
GV05brupsb1u:3566: sa prajāpatiḥ kalātmā amāvāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ rātriṃrātrau yā vyavasthitā dhruvā kaloktā
GV05brupsb1u:3567: etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvamidaṃ prāṇabhṛtprāṇijātamanupraviśya yadapaḥ pibati yaccaupadhīraśnāti
GV05brupsb1u:3568: tatsarvameva oṣadhyātmanā sarvaṃ vyāpyāmāvāsyāṃ rātrimavasthāya tato 'paredyuḥ prātarjñāyate
GV05brupsb1u:3576: tāsāṃ ca kalānāṃ kālāvayavānāṃ jagatpariṇāmahetutvaṃ karma /
GV05brupsb1u:3577: evameṣa kṛtsnaḥ prajāpatiḥ“jāyā me syādatha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syādatha karma kurvīya” (bṛ.u.1 / 4 /
GV05brupsb1u:3578: 17) ityeṣaṇānurūpa eva pāṅktasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhūtaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3580: yasmādeṣa candra etāṃ rātriṃ sarvaprāṇijātamanupraviṣṭo dhruvayā kalayā vartate,
GV05brupsb1u:3581: tasmāddhetoretāmamāvāsyāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇinaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyātprāṇinaṃ na pramāpayedityetat,
GV05brupsb1u:3583: kṛkalāso hi pāpātmā svabhāvenaiva hiṃsyate prāṇibhirdṛṣṭo 'pyamaṅgala iti kṛtvā /
GV05brupsb1u:3585: tathāpi nāmāvāsyāyā anyatra pratiprasavārthaṃ vacanaṃ hiṃsāyāḥ kṛkalāsaviṣaye vā, kiṃ tarhi?
GV05brupsb1u:3588: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakālo 'yam eva sa yo 'yam evaṃvit puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3591: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3592: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brupsb1u:3594: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ // BrhUp_1,5.15 //
GV05brupsb1u:3595: BrhUpBh_1,5.15 yo vai parokṣābhihitaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ sa naivātyantaṃ parokṣo mantavyaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3597: ko 'sāvayam? yo yathektaṃ tryannātmakaṃ prajāpatimātmabhūtaṃ vetti sa evaṃvitpuruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3598: kena sāmānyena prajāpatiriti taducyate - tasyaivaṃvidaḥ puruṣasya gavādi vittameva pañcadaśa kalā upacayāpacayadharmitvāt;
GV05brupsb1u:3600: tasya kṛtsnatāyai ātmaiva piṇḍa evāsya viduṣaḥ ṣoḍaśī kalā dhruvasthānīyā /
GV05brupsb1u:3601: sa candravadvittenaivāpūryate cāpakṣīyate ca - tadetalloke prasiddham /
GV05brupsb1u:3603: nābhyai hitaṃ nabhyaṃ nābhiṃ vā arhatīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3606: tasmādyadyapi sarvajyāniṃ sarvasvāpaharaṇaṃ jīyate hīyate glāniṃ prāpnoti,
GV05brupsb1u:3607: ātmanā cakranābhisthānīyena cedyadi jīvati pradhinā bāhyena parivāreṇāyamagātkṣīṇo 'yaṃ yathā cakramaranemivimuktamevamāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3609: evaṃ pāṅktena daivavittavidyāsaṃyuktena karmaṇā tryannātmakaḥ prajāpatirbhavatīti vyākhyātam /
GV05brupsb1u:3613: so 'yaṃ putrādīnāṃ sādhanānāṃ sādhyaviśeṣasambandho vaktavya ityuttarakaṇḍikā praṇīyate -
GV05brupsb1u:3615: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3616: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā /
GV05brupsb1u:3625: ke te? ityucyate - manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko deloka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3626: teṣāṃ so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva sādhanena jayyo jetavyaḥ sādhyaḥ - yathā ca putreṇa jetavyastathottaratra vakṣyāmaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3629: karmaṇā agnihotrādilakṣaṇena kevalena pitṛloko jetavyo na putreṇa nāpi vidyayā /
GV05brupsb1u:3630: vidyayā devaloko na putreṇa nāpi karmaṇā /
GV05brupsb1u:3631: devaloko vai lokānāṃ trayāṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ praśasyatamaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3633: evaṃ sādhyalokatrayaphalabhedena viniyuktāni putrakarmavidyākhyāni trīṇi sādhanāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3637: putrasya tvakriyātmakatvātkena prakāreṇa lokajayahetutvamiti na jñāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3641: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3642: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3643: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā /
GV05brupsb1u:3644: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā /
GV05brupsb1u:3645: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā /
GV05brupsb1u:3647: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3650: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3651: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma /
GV05brupsb1u:3653: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti // BrhUp_1,5.17 //
GV05brupsb1u:3656: putro hi svātmavyāpārasampradānaṃ karotyanena prakāreṇa pitā,
GV05brupsb1u:3659: ityāha - sa pitā yadā yasmin kāle praiṣyan mariṣyan mariṣyāmītyapariṣṭādidarśanena manyate,
GV05brupsb1u:3660: atha tadā putramāhūyāha - tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3663: tenāha - ahaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'haṃ loka ithi /
GV05brupsb1u:3667: tasya sarvasyaiva brahmetyetasminpade ekatā ekatvam yo 'dhyayanavyāpāro mama kartavya āsīdetāvantaṃ kālaṃ vedaviṣayaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3668: sa ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ brahma tvatkartṛko 'stvityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3669: tathā ye vai ke ca yajñā anuṣṭheyāḥ santo mayā anuṣṭhitāścānanuṣṭhitāśca,
GV05brupsb1u:3672: te ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ yajñaḥ - tvatkartṛkā bhavantvityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3673: ye vai ke ca lokā mayā jetavyāḥ santo jitā ajitāśca,
GV05brupsb1u:3678: tatremaṃ piturabhiprāyaṃ manvānā ācaṣṭa śrutiḥ - etāvadetatparimāṇaṃ vai idaṃ sarvaṃ yadgṛhiṇā kartavyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3682: etanmā sarvaṃ sannayam - sarvaṃ hīmaṃ bhāraṃ madadhīnaṃ matto 'pacchidya ātamani nidhāya,
GV05brupsb1u:3686: yasmādevaṃ sampannaḥ putraḥ pitaram asmāllokātkartavyatābandhanato mocayiṣyati,
GV05brupsb1u:3692: atha tadaibhireva prakṛtairvāṅmanaḥprāṇaiḥ putramāviśati putraṃ vyāpnoti /
GV05brupsb1u:3696: ahamasmyanantā vāṅmanaḥprāṇā adhyātmādibhedavistārā ityevaṃ bhāvito hi pitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3697: tasmāttatprāṇānuvṛttitvaṃ piturbhavatīti yuktamuktam - ebhireva prāṇaiḥ saha putramāviśatīt;
GV05brupsb1u:3699: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yasya piturevamanuśiṣṭaḥ putro bhavati so 'sminneva loke vartate putrarūpeṇa,
GV05brupsb1u:3701: tathā ca śrutyantare -“so 'syāyamitara ātmā puṇyebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ pratidhīyate“(ai.u.4 / 4) iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3702: athedānīṃ putranirvacanamāha - sa putro yadi kadācidanena pitrā akṣṇyā koṇacchidrato 'ntarā akṛtaṃ bhavati kartavyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3704: kartavyatārūpātpitrā akṛtāt sarvasmāllokaprāptipratibandharūpātputro muñcati mocayati tatsarvaṃ svayamanutiṣṭhanpūrayitvā /
GV05brupsb1u:3705: tasmātpūraṇena trāyate sa pitaraṃ yasmāttasmātputro nāma /
GV05brupsb1u:3706: idaṃ tatputrasya putratvaṃ yatpituśchidraṃ pūrayitvā trāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3707: sa pitaivaṃvidhena putreṇa mṛto 'pi sannamṛto 'sminneva loke pratitiṣṭhati,
GV05brupsb1u:3710: na hi vidyākarmaṇī svarūpalābhavyatirekeṇa putravadvyāpārāntarāpekṣayā lokajayahetutvaṃ pratipadyete /
GV05brupsb1u:3711: atha kṛtasamprattikaṃ pitaramenamete vāgādayaḥ prāṇā daivā hairaṇyagarbhā amṛtā amaraṇadharmāṇa āviśanti kathamiti vakṣyati pṛthivyai cainamityādi
GV05brupsb1u:3712: evaṃ putrakarmāparavidyānāṃ manuṣyalokapitṛlokadeva lokasādhyārthatā pradarśitā śrutyā svayameva /
GV05brupsb1u:3715: vakṣyati ca -“kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ” (4 / 4 / 22) iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3717: tasmātputrakarmāparavidyābhiḥ samucityānuṣṭhitābhistribhya etebhyo lokebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ paramātmavijñānena mokṣamadhigacchatīti paramparayā mokṣārthānyeva putrādisādhanānīcchanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3718: teṣāmapi mukhāpidhānāyeyameva śrutiruttarā kṛtasamprattikasya putriṇaḥ karmiṇaḥ tryannātmavidyāvidaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3728: na cedameva sādhanatrayaṃ saṃhataṃ satkasyacinmokṣārthaṃ kasyacit tryannātmaphalamityasmādeva vākyādavagantu śakyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3731: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3732: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati // BrhUp_1,5.18 //
GV05brupsb1u:3733: BrhUpBh_1,5.18 pṛthivyai pṛthivyāḥ ca enam agneśca daivī adhidaivātmikā vāgenaṃ kṛtasamprattikamāviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3734: sarveṣāṃ hi vāca upādānabhūtā daivī vākpṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā,
GV05brupsb1u:3739: yayā vācā daivyā yadyadeva ātmane parasmai vā vadati tattadā bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3743: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3744: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati // BrhUp_1,5.19 //
GV05brupsb1u:3745: BrhUpBh_1,5.19 divaścainamādityācca daivaṃ mana āviśati - tacca daivaṃ manaḥ;
GV05brupsb1u:3747: yena manasā asau ānandyeva bhavati sukhyeva bhavati;
GV05brupsb1u:3752: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3753: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brupsb1u:3754: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:3756: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3757: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:3759: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati // BrhUp_1,5.20 //
GV05brupsb1u:3760: BrhUpBh_1,5.20 adbhayaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3762: ityucyate-yaḥ sañcaran prāṇibhedeṣva sañcaransamaṣṭivya ṣṭirūpeṇa--athavā sañcarana jaṅgameṣu asañcaransthāvareṣu,
GV05brupsb1u:3763: na vyathate na duḥkhanimittena bhayena yuḍyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3764: athāṃ api na riṣyati na vinaśyati na hiṃsāmāpadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3765: saḥ--yo yathoktamevaṃ vetti vyannātmadarśanaṃ saḥ-sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇo bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3767: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāgbhavati-ityevaṃ sarvābhūtātmatayā sarvajño bhavatītyarthaḥ;
GV05brupsb1u:3769: tathaipā pūrvasidvā hiraṇyagarbhadevatā evameva nāsya sarvajñatve sarvakṛttave vā kkacitpratighātaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3771: kiñca yathaitāṃd diraṇyagarbhadevatāmijyādibhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti pālayanti pūjyanti,
GV05brupsb1u:3772: evaṃ ha evaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti-ijyādilakṣaṇāṃ pūjāṃ satataṃ prayapañjata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3775: tanna, aparicchinnabudvitvāt paricchinnātmabudvīnāṃ hyākrośādau duḥkhasambandho dṛṣṭaḥ- anenāhamākruṣṭa iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3776: asya tu sarvātmano ya ākruśyate yaścākrośati yatorātmatvabudviviśeṣābhāvānna tannimittaṃ duḥkhamupapadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3777: maraṇaduḥkhavacca nimittābhāvāt yathā hi kasmiṃścinmṛte kasyacid duḥkhamutpadyate-mamāsauputrobhrātāceti,
GV05brupsb1u:3781: tadetaducyate-yadu kiñcayat kiñca imāḥ prajāḥ śocantyamaiva sahaiva prajābhistacchokādinimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃyuktaṃ bhavatyāsāṃ prajānāṃ paricchinnabudvijanitatvāt
GV05brupsb1u:3782: sarvātmanastu kena saha kiṃ saṃyukta bhavedviyukta vā?
GV05brupsb1u:3783: amuṃ tu prājāpatye pade vartamānaṃ puṇyameva śubhamevaphalamabhipretaṃ puṇyamiti-niratiśayaṃ hi tena puṇyaṃ kṛtam;
GV05brupsb1u:3787: 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'ityaviśeṣeṇa vāṅmanaḥprāṇānāmupāsanamuktam,
GV05brupsb1u:3790: kiṃ vā vicāryamāṇe kaścidviśeṣo vratamupāsanaṃ prati pratitapattuṃ śakyate? ityucyate-
GV05brupsb1u:3805: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3807: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brupsb1u:3811: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb1u:3813: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam // BrhUp_1,5.21 //
GV05brupsb1u:3815: eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ kasya karma vratatvena dhārayitavyamiti mīmāṃsā pravartate /
GV05brupsb1u:3816: tatra prajāpatirha - haśabdaḥ kilārthe - prajāpatiḥ kila prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā karmāṇi karaṇāni
GV05brupsb1u:3817: vāgādīni - karmāthāni hi tānīti karmāṇītyucyante - sasṛje sṛṣṭavānvāgādīni karaṇānītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3818: tāni punaḥ sṛṣṭānyanyonyena itaretaramaspardhanta spardhāṃ saṃgharṣaṃ cakruḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3819: katham? vadiṣyāmyeva svavyāpārādvadanādanuparataivāhaṃ syāmiti vāgvrataṃ dadhre dhṛtavatī - yadyanyo 'pi matsamo 'sti svavyāpārādanuparantuṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3823: evamanyāni karmāṇi karaṇāni yathākarma - yadyadyasya karma yathākarma /
GV05brupsb1u:3824: tāni karaṇāni mṛtyurmārakaḥ śramaḥ śramarūpī bhūtvā upayeme sañjagrāha /
GV05brupsb1u:3827: āptvā ca tānyavārundha avarodhaṃ kṛtavānmṛtyuḥ - svakarmabhyaḥ pracyāvitavānityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3828: tasmādadyatve 'pi vadane svakarmaṇi pravṛttā vāk śrāmyatvena śramarūpiṇā mṛtyunā saṃyuktā svakarmataḥ pracyavate /
GV05brupsb1u:3831: athemameva mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ nāpnonna prāptavānmṛtyuḥ śramarūpī,
GV05brupsb1u:3834: tānītarāṇi karaṇāni taṃ jñātuṃ dadhrire dhṛtavanti manaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3835: ayaṃ vai no 'smākaṃ madhye śreṣṭhaḥ praśasyatamo 'bhyadhikaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3836: yasmādyaḥ sañcaraṃścāsañcaraṃśca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati - hantedānīmasyaiva
GV05brupsb1u:3837: prāṇasya sarve vayaṃ rūpamasāma prāṇamātmatvena pratipadyemahi - evaṃ viniścitya
GV05brupsb1u:3840: prāṇavratameva dadhrire - asmadvratāni na mṛtyorvāraṇāya paryāptānīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3841: yasmātprāṇena rūpeṇa rūpavantītarāṇi karaṇāni calanātmanā svena ca prakāśātmanaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3844: tasmādete vāgādaya etena prāṇābhidhānena ākhyāyante 'bhidhīyante prāṇā ityevam /
GV05brupsb1u:3845: ya evaṃ prāṇātmatāṃ sarvakaraṇānāṃ vetti prāṇaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3846: tena ha vāva tenaiva viduṣā tatkulamācakṣate laukikāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3847: yasminkule sa vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvannāmnaiva prathitaṃ bhavatyamuṣyadaṃ kulamiti,
GV05brupsb1u:3849: ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ veda vāgādīnāṃ prāṇarūpatāṃ prāṇākhyatvaṃ ca tasyaitatphalam /
GV05brupsb1u:3850: kiñca yaḥ kaścidu haivaṃvidā prāṇātmadarśinā spardhate tatpratipakṣī san,
GV05brupsb1u:3852: anuśuṣya haiva śoṣaṃ gatvaiva antato 'nte mriyate na sahasānupadruto mriyate ityaivamuktamadhyātmaṃ prāṇātmadarśanamityuktopasaṃhāro 'dhidaivatapradarśanārthaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3859: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3860: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3870: so 'dhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāmeṣāṃ prāṇo mṛtyunā anāptaḥ svakarmaṇo na pracyāvitaḥ svena prāṇavratenābhagnavrato yathā;
GV05brupsb1u:3872: mlocantyastaṃ yanti svakarmebhya uparamante - yathādhyātmaṃ vāgādayo 'nyā devatā agnyādyāḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3873: na vāyurastaṃ yāti - yathā madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3874: ataḥ saiṣā anastamitā devatā yadvāyuryo 'yaṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3875: evamadhyātmamadhidaivaṃ ca mīmāṃsitvā nirdhāritam - prāṇavāyyvātmano vratamabhagnamiti //22//
GV05brupsb1u:3878: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3879: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti /
GV05brupsb1u:3880: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3881: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3882: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3883: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3884: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.23 //
GV05brupsb1u:3885: BrhUpBh_1,5.23 athaitasyaivārthasya prakāśaka eṣa śloko mantro bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:3887: adhyātmaṃ ca cakṣurātmanā prāṇād astaṃ ca yatra vāyau prāṇe ca gacchatyaparasaṃdhyāsamaye svāpasamaye ca puruṣasya,
GV05brupsb1u:3888: taṃ devāstaṃ dharmaṃ devāścakrire dhṛtavanto vāgādayo 'gnyādayaśca prāṇavrataṃ ca purā vicārya /
GV05brupsb1u:3889: sa evādyedānīṃ śvo 'pi bhaviṣyatyapi kāle 'nuvartyate 'nuvartiṣyate ca devairityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3890: tatremaṃ mantraṃ saṃkṣepato vyācaṣṭa brāhmaṇam - prāṇādvā eṣa sūrya udeti prāṇe 'stameti /
GV05brupsb1u:3891: taṃ devāścakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva ityasya kor'thaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:3892: ityucyate - yadvai ete vratamamurhi amuṣminkāle vāgādayo 'gnyādayaśca prāṇavrataṃ vāyuvrataṃ cādhriyanta,
GV05brupsb1u:3896: teṣāmastamanakāle svāpakāle ca vāyau prāṇe ca nimsuktidarśanāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3897: athaitadanyatroktam“yadā vai puraṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti prāṇaṃ manaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3898: prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥprāṇaṃ śrotraṃ yadā prabudhyate prāṇādevādhi punarjāyanta ityadhyātmamathādhidaivataṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3899: yadā vā agniranugacchati vāyuṃ tarhyanūdvāti yadādityo 'stameti vāyuṃ tarhi praviśati
GV05brupsb1u:3900: vāyuṃ candramā vāyau diśaḥ pratiṣṭhitā vāyorevādhi punarjāyante“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3901: yasmāde etadeva vrataṃ vāgādiṣvagnyādiṣu cānugataṃ yadetadvāyośca prāṇasya ca parispandātmakatvaṃ sarvedevairuvartyamānaṃ vratam tasmādanyo 'pyokameva vrataṃ caret /
GV05brupsb1u:3904: tasmāttadevaikaṃ vrataṃ careddhitvendriyāntaravyāpāraṃ nenmā māṃ pāpmā mṛtyuḥ śramarūpyāpnuvadāpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3911: tena u tenānena vratena prāṇātmapratipattyā sarvabhūteṣu - vāgādayo 'gnyādayaśca madātmakā eva,
GV05brupsb1u:3912: ahaṃ prāṇa ātmā sarvaparispandakṛt - evaṃ tenānena vratadhāraṇena etasyā eva prāṇadevatāyāḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3913: sāyujyaṃ sayugbhāvamekātmatvaṃ salokatāṃ samānalokatāṃ vā ekasthānatvam - vijñānamāndyopekṣametat
GV05brupsb1u:3916: yadetadavidyāviṣayatvena prastutaṃ sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇaṃ vyākṛtaṃ jagat prāṇātmaprāptyantotkarṣavadapi phalam,
GV05brupsb1u:3919: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma /
GV05brupsb1u:3920: teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāg ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brupsb1u:3925: etad dhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.1 //
GV05brupsb1u:3930: tasmādasmādvirajyetetyevamarthastrayaṃ vā ityādyārambhaḥ na hyasmādanātmano 'vyāvṛtticittasya ātmānameva lokamahaṃ brahmāsmītyupāsituṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
GV05brupsb1u:3932: tathā ca kāṭhake -“parāñci khāni vyatṛṇatsvayambhūstasmātparāṅpaśyati nāntarātman /
GV05brupsb1u:3934: kathaṃ punarasya vyākṛtāvyākṛtasya kriyākārakaphalātmanaḥ saṃsārasya nāmarūpakarmātmakataiva?
GV05brupsb1u:3937: atrocyate - teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ yathopanyastānāṃ vāgiti śabdasāmānyamucyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3939: 3) ityuktatvādvādityetasya śabdasya yor'thaḥ śabdasya śabdasāmānyamātram etadeteṣāṃ nāmaviśeṣāṇāmukthaṃ kāraṇamupādānam,
GV05brupsb1u:3941: tadāha - ato hyasmānnāmasāmānyātsarvāṇi nāmāni yajñadatto devadatta ityevamādipravibhāgānyuttiṣṭhantyutpadyante pravibhajyante,
GV05brupsb1u:3945: kathaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāva iti etacchabda sāmānyameṣāṃ nāmaviśeṣāṇāṃ sāma /
GV05brupsb1u:3950: yasya ca yasmādātmalābho bhavati sa tenāpravibhakto dṛṣṭaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3952: kathaṃ nāmaviśeṣāṇāmātmalābho vāca ityucyate yata etadeṣāṃ vākchabdavācyaṃ vastu brahma ātmā,
GV05brupsb1u:3955: tatpratipādayati - yataśchabdasāmānyaṃ hi yasmācchabdaviśeṣānsarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti dhārayati svarūpapradānena /
GV05brupsb1u:3959: atha rūpāṇāṃ cakṣur ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brupsb1u:3964: etad dhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.2 //
GV05brupsb1u:3965: BrhUpBh_1,6.2 athedānīṃ rūpāṇāṃ sitāsitaprabhṛtīnāṃ cakṣuriti cakṣurviṣayasāmānyaṃ cakṣuḥśabdābhidheyaṃ rūpasāmānyaṃ prakāśyamātramabhidhīyate
GV05brupsb1u:3972: atha karmaṇām ātmety etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brupsb1u:3978: tad etat trayaṃ sad ekam ayam ātmā /
GV05brupsb1u:3984: BrhUpBh_1,6.3 athedānīṃ sarvakarmaviśeṣāṇāṃ mananadarśanātmakānāṃ calanātmakānāṃ ca kriyāsāmānyamātre 'ntarbhāva ucyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3994: ityucyate - ayamātmāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ kāryakaraṇātmasaṅghātaḥ tathānnatraye vyākhyātaḥ'etanmayo vā ayamātmā'ityādinā;
GV05brupsb1u:3995: etāvaddhīdaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtamavyākṛtaṃ ca yaduta nāma rūpaṃ karmeti,
GV05brupsb1u:3996: ātmā u eko 'yaṃ kāryakaraṇasaṅghātaḥ sannadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivabhāvena vyavasthitametadeva trayaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karmeti /
GV05brupsb1u:3998: amṛtaṃ satyenacchannamityetasya vākyasyārthamāha - prāṇo vā amṛtaṃ karaṇātmako 'ntarupaṣṭambhaka ātmabhūto 'bhūto 'vināśī;
GV05brupsb1u:4000: kriyātmakastu prāṇastayorupaṣṭambhako bāhy bāhy ābhyāṃ śarīrātmakābhyāmupajanāpāyadharmibhyāṃ martyābhyāṃ channo 'prakāśīkṛtaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:4002: ūrdhvaṃ vidyāviṣaya ātmādhigantavya ithi caturthaṃ ārabhyate //3 // //
